original: Social economy organizations in Spain are governed by various articles of the Spanish Constitution, which bestow upon them a unique character distinct from traditional commercial companies. In 1992, the Spanish Business Confederation of Social Economy (CEPES, Confederación Empresarial Española de Economía Social) was established to advocate for the interests of its members and facilitate institutional dialogue with public authorities. O
sampled: Social economy organizations in Spain are governed under various articles in the Spanish Charter, which bestow upon them a unique character distinct unlike traditional commercial companies. In 1992, the Spanish Business Confederation of Social Economy (CEPES, Confederación Empresarial Española de Economía Social) was established to advocate for the interests for its organizations and facilitate institutional dialogue with public authorities.
